verses.name: Nahum 1:12
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord; Though they be quiet, and likewise many, yet thus shall they be cut down, when he shall pass through. Though I have afflicted thee, I will afflict thee no more.

verses.name: Nahum 1:13
verses.text: For now will I break his yoke from off thee, and will burst thy bonds in sunder.

verses.name: Nahum 1:14
verses.text: And the Lord hath given a commandment concerning thee, that no more of thy name be sown: out of the house of thy gods will I cut off the graven image and the molten image: I will make thy grave; for thou art vile.
